name: Tempeh
love: Curried Tempeh Grilled Cheese Sandwich with Mango Chutney
description: Use medium heat and a weight on top of the sandwich and you will have perfectly golden grilled cheeses every time

name: Soybeans
description: The freshness of zucchini topped with sauteed soya and baked lovely. A snack for a perfect evening!

name: Lentils
description: Khichdi is an Indian preparation made from rice and lentils. I add my favorite veggies to it like beans, carrot, onion, with lots of corriander topping.

name: Black beans
description: Curried black beans with tomatoes, onions and spices

name: Kidney beans
description: This is my all time favourite. Always up for it.

name: Chickpeas
description: Confused over what to cook for lunch? This sensational recipe will fix you with a wholesome and filling afternoon meal.

name: Lima beans
description: Like Rajma (kidney beans) lima beans are first boiled then simmered into spicy gravy made with onion, garlic, tomatoes and traditional Indian spices.

name: Black-eyed peas
description: In Gujarati it is known as chawli or chovli. Lobia masala sabzi goes really well with hot chappati, phulka or paratha. Even they taste great with steamed rice or jeera rice.

name: Veggie baked beans
love: Baked Beans and Potato Baked Dish
description: Close your eyes, think of everything you like, open your eyes and you will find them in this dish!

name: Tofu, firm
description: A quick and easy recipe in which I have to fry the onions, green chili and saute the tomatoes and tofu. It gets ready in 15 minutes.

name: Quinoa
description: Upma is my favorite and I prepare it often. I love all varieties of upma, be it rava upma or arisi upma or aval upma or oats upma.

name: Peas
description: Usually I combine peas with other veggies to make dishes like aloo matar, matar paneer, mushroom matar, gobi matar or aloo gajar matar. But at times i just make a gravy like this recipeÂ or make a dry peas curry.

name: Peanut butter
description: The simplest yet the tastiest recipe.

name: Almonds
description: Almonds soaked overnight in water and taken first thing in the morning is super benificial

name: Soy milk
description: Instead of regular toned milk, I prefer flavoured soy milk and Chocolate is ofcourse my favourite

name: Whole wheat bread
description: Wheat bread with fruits makes up my breakfast for most of the days.

name: Almond butter
description: I have never made this myself, but once my mom made this for me and it was delicious. Best snack to have with evening tea.

name: Bulgur
description: What I love about bulgur wheat is its nutty flavor and chewy texture and also it does not need cooking or needs very less cooking.

name: Sunflower seeds
description: Tikki is very famous indian roadside dish. Add sunflower seeds to add the goodness.

name: Cashews
description: My favourite chai-time snack.

name: Spinach
description: Spinach with lentils make a very healthy and tasty combination.

name: Broccoli
description: This is love of my life second only to my dog, cooper. Give me Broccoli in any form.
